name: Last Light (itch) (citizen-blue)
description:
You wake up. The station lies in ruins around you, and your AtmoTek (trademark)  suit is running on reserve energy. To survive, you must fight your way through back to your ship, but be careful. If you don't bring enough energy back, you will never escape the unstable station.

CONTROLS:

W to jump

A to move left

D to move right

E to interact with objects

Left Click a subsystem to allocate energy to it from your reserve

Right Click a subsystem to remove energy to it and add it back to your reserve

[Spacebar] to boost your jetpack

Right Click within the viewport to aim

Left Click while aiming to shoot

Solo developed in Godot v3.4
Created for GoGodotJam2 (with theme Energy Source)
